lead_paragraph: Relief pitcher Brian Bruney and the Yankees agreed to a one-year, $725,000 contract. Bruney, a right-hander who turns 26 on Feb. 17, asked for $845,000 in arbitration and was offered $640,000. He made $395,545 last year, when he went 3-2 with a 4.68 earned run average in 58 appearances.
